rukus.text: 50|1|k hv .  a l laoh sbath nung kompir kuor an del mha thkomthkaeng .

50|2|( puokke min ttuol vea laey) phtoytowvinh  puokke meankar phnheakphaael  prohte anak dasatuen promean mneak knongchamnaom puokke  ban mokadl puokke .  haey puok del brachheang ban niyeay tha  nih chea  brakear muoy da chamlek .
50|3|tae nowpel del puok yeung slab  haey puok yeung ban klay  tow chea dei noh ( puok yeung ach rsa laengvinh ban ryy)?  kar vilotralb  noh min ach kaetlaeng ban laey .
50|4|tampit yeung ban doeng nouv avei( reangkay) knongchamnaom puokke  del dei romleay .  haey yeung mean sievphow kamnttra .
50|5|phtoytowvinh puokke ban bdeseth nung karpit( kompir kuor an)  nowpel del vea ban mokadl puokke .  haey puokke sthet knong pheap  chrabaukachrabl( mindoeng muoy na khosa ryy trauv laey) .
50|6|dau che  neah  tae puokke min samlung meul mekh del now pi leu puokke  teryy  tae yeung ban bangkeut vea  ning ban tobteng vea daoy vea kmean kar  bek be  reah noh yeangna
50|7|haey phendei  yeung ban pongreab vea  ning ban bangkeut phnom cheachraen  now leu vea  haeyning ban bandoh now leu vea nouv roukkhcheate krobbebyeang  da srasabamprong
50|8|daembi aoy kheunhochbasa leasa  ning chea kar romluk samreab real khnhom  robsa a l laoh del sarphap kamhosa .

50|9|haey yeung ban banhchouh tukaphlieng del mean porchy pileu mekh  ruoch yeung ban bandoh chenhpi vea nouv chamkar damna cheachraen  ning braphet  thonhnhocheate del ach chrautkeat( bramoul phl) ban .
50|10|ning daem lmeu khpasa skoemoskai  del mean changkom phle chaksreah  leu knea cheachuor .

50|11|chea leaphosakkar samreab khnhom robsa a l laoh .  haey yeung  ban thveu aoy dei del slab( kmean chicheate) meanchivit( meanchicheate)laeng  vinh daoysaar vea( tukaphlieng) .  dauchnaoh der  yeung ban thveu aoy puok anak  rsa laengvinh( now thngai barlok) .
50|12|krom robsa nuoh  ning puok rsa  haeyning sa mou d ban bdeseth  moun puokke .
50|13|haey ad  ning hvie r aon  ning bangobaaun robsa lout .

50|14|ning anak del rsanow ai ka sa( krom robsa shou eb) prom  teang krom tou b bak  puok teangnoh sotthote ban bdeseth nung banda anak  noam sar .  dau che  neah  karosanyea thveu tearoun k mmm robsa yeung kaban thleak tow  leu puokke .
50|15|dau che  neah  tae yeung kmean samotthaphap champoh kar bangkeut chea leuk  dambaung ryy? phtoytowvinh  puokke te del sthet knong pheap sangsay ampi kar  bangkeut sachathmei noh .
